operations.name: Get Journal Entries by System ID and Element Type
operations.notes:
Journal Entries contain several different types of comments or data.  

The Journal Element parameter references this type. Common values are:
-work_notes
-comments
- approval_history


The Element ID parameter is the sys_id of the related record such as the Incident record

operations.notes:

config.path: /submissions/{{Submission Id}}/files/{{Field Name}}/{{File Index}}/{{URL Encoded File Name}}/url

operations.name: Create User
operations.notes: Creates a new user in the Kinetic Platform. Required fields: username, email. Optional fields: displayName, enabled (default: true), spaceAdmin (default: false), preferredLocale, profileAttributesMap (JSON object), memberships (JSON array).

operations.name: Get Random Cat Fact
operations.notes: Returns a random cat fact with its character length
